title: NIV, The Maxwell Leadership Bible
description: The Leadership expert, John Maxwell, provides an in-depth look at God's laws for leaders and leadership, directly connected to the Bible. Now for the first time, the content of "The Maxwell Leadership Bible" is paired with the bestselling New International Version.Features include:Complete NIV Bible text and translators' notes Book introductions Articles describing the 21 Laws of Leadership and the 21 Qualities of a Leader Notes throughout the Bible that connect with the Laws and Qualities Indexes to the 21 Laws of Leadership and the 21 Qualities of a LeaderPart of the "Signature Series" line of Thomas Nelson Bibles"Maxwell Leadership Bibles" sold to date: More than 675,000
author: John C. Maxwell
